term.title: bismuthines

item.text: BiH3 and compounds derived from it by substituting one, two or three hydrogen atoms by hydrocarbyl groups: R3Bi, RBiH2, R2BiH ( R â‰ H ) are called primary, secondary and tertiary bismuthines, respectively. A specific bismuthine is preferably named as a substituted bismuthane, e.g. (CH3)3Bi trimethylbismuthane.

sources.item: PAC, 1995, 67, 1307. 'Glossary of class names of organic compounds and reactivity intermediates based on structure (IUPAC Recommendations 1995)' on page 1323 (https://doi.org/10.1351/pac199567081307)
